name: Red Ring Rico's GOL Game Jam Entry [2015]
name_original: Red Ring Rico's GOL Game Jam Entry [2015]
description:
Red Ring Rico's GOL Game Jam Entry [2015] is a game developed by Red Ring Rico. It was originally released in 2015.
Red Ring Rico's GOL Game Jam Entry [2015] is available on Linux. You can purchase the game on itch.io.
